titles.title: Congratulating the Penn State women's volleyball team on winning the 2009 NCAA Division I National Championship.
Congratulating the Penn State women's volleyball team on winning the 2009 NCAA Division I National Championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Ms. Hirono moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 1015.

At the conclusion of debate, the chair put the question on the motion to suspend the rules. Ms. Hirono objected to the vote on the grounds that a quorum was not present. Further proceedings on the motion were postponed. The point of no quorum was withdrawn.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote (2/3 required): 396 - 0, 1 Present (Roll no. 7).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Higher Education and Workforce Development Subcomittee

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Congratulates the Penn State women's volleyball team on winning the 2009 NCAA Division I women's volleyball championship.
